module.title: Completion
module.name: wink.plugins.completion.Component
module.description: Create a completion box linked to an input

page.description: A set of completion examples with local and remote data

module.compatibility: Iphone OS2, Iphone OS3, Iphone OS4, Android 1.5, Android 2.1, Android 2.2, Android 2.3, Android 3.0, Android 3.1, BlackBerry 6, BlackBerry 7, Windows Phone 7.5

instanciation.description: To instantiate a completion, you must give a property array to the Component and call the start method. Each completion box have a unique identifier.

property.name: input
property.description: The completion input

property.name: uId
property.description: The unique identifier of the completion.

property.name: managers

method.name: start
method.description: start the completion

method.name: stop
method.description: stop the completion

method.name: restart
method.description: restart the completion with given new properties

method.name: isStarted
method.description: check if the completion is correctly started

method.name: showCompletion
method.description: force showing the current completion box

method.name: hideCompletion
method.description: force hiding the current completion box

method.name: addSuggestion
method.description: add a new item in suggestions list

parameter.name: index
parameter.description: The index of the added suggestion. Default index is last index

method.name: getSuggestion
method.description: get the suggestion item at specified index

method.name: getSuggestions
method.description: get all the suggestions list

method.name: resetSuggestions
method.description: reset the suggestions list

method.name: getHighlightedSuggestion
method.description: get the current preselected suggestion item

method.name: getSelectedSuggestion
method.description: get the current selected suggestion item

method.name: calculateShiftHighlightedIndex
method.description: calculate index increased by shift value

parameter.name: shiftValue
parameter.description: the value to add (positive or negative)

method.name: highlight
method.description: highlight the suggestion specified by given index

method.name: unhighlight
method.description: unhighlight all suggestions

method.name: saveSelectedSuggestionInHistory
method.description: save the current selected suggestion in history

method.name: resetHistory
method.description: reset all history suggestions

property.name: input
property.description: the input HTMLElement

property.name: uId
property.description: the unique completion identifier

property.name: managers
property.description: the manager's configurations array

component.name: wink.plugins.completion.manager.data.LocalDataManager
component.description: define the completion local data manager with default values

method.name: start
method.description: start the data manager

method.name: stop
method.description: stop the data manager

method.name: searchData
method.description: run the local search process using the specified query string

property.name: suggestions
property.description: the suggestions data array

property.name: minQueryLength
property.description: the minimum query length

property.name: maxSearchedSuggestions
property.description: the maximum searched suggestions count

property.name: callbacks
property.description: the array containing all processable callbacks

property.name: removeDuplicateSuggestions
property.description: the boolean value that indicate if we have to remove duplicate suggestions

property.name: stripAccents
property.description: Indicate if we use strip accents for the suggestions search

component.name: wink.plugins.completion.manager.data.RemoteDataManager
component.description: define the completion remote data manager with default values

method.name: start
method.description: start the data manager

method.name: stop
method.description: stop the data manager

method.name: searchData
method.description: run the remote search process using the specified query string

property.name: url
property.description: the Remote server URL to call

property.name: queryParamName
property.description: the query parameter name to use in the URL

property.name: sendMethod
property.description: the send method to use (GET or POST)

property.name: minQueryLength
property.description: the minimum query length

property.name: callbacks
property.description: the array containing all processable callbacks

property.name: removeDuplicateSuggestions
property.description: the boolean that indicate if we have to remove duplicate suggestions

component.name: wink.plugins.completion.manager.dom.SimpleDomManager
component.description: define the completion dom manager with default values

method.name: start
method.description: start the DOM manager

method.name: stop
method.description: stop the DOM manager

method.name: buildDomNode
method.description: build the DOM node using the internal suggestion of the Component

method.name: showDomNode
method.description: show the DOM node

method.name: hideDomNode
method.description: hide the DOM node

method.name: highlight
method.description: highlight a specific DOM suggestion

parameter.name: index
parameter.description: index of the suggestion to highlight

method.name: unhighlight
method.description: unhighlight all DOM suggestions

method.name: updatePositions
method.description: update the size and the position of the DOM node

method.name: getDomNode
method.description: return the DOM node

method.name: getSuggestionDomNode
method.description: return the suggestion DOM node specified by the index

property.name: domNode
property.description: the DOM node HTMLElement

property.name: callbacks
property.description: the array containing all processable callbacks

property.name: cssPrefix
property.description: the CSS prefix used for all HTMLElement

property.name: borderSize
property.description: the CSS border size value

component.name: wink.plugins.completion.manager.event.SimpleEventManager
component.description: define the completion event manager with default values

method.name: start
method.description: start the event manager

method.name: stop
method.description: stop the event manager

method.name: addMouseEventListenersOnNewSuggestion
method.description: append mouse listener to the DOM suggestion

parameter.name: index
parameter.description: the index of the current suggestion

method.name: onInputBlur
method.description: manage the onBlur event of the Component's input

method.name: onInputKeyUp
method.description: manage the onKeyUp event of the Component's input

method.name: onInputKeyDown
method.description: manage the onKeyDown event of the Component's input

method.name: getSelectionCallback
method.description: return the selection callback if defined

property.name: closeOnBlur
property.description: indicate if we have to close the completion on blur event

property.name: callbacks
property.description: the array containing all processable callbacks

component.name: wink.plugins.completion.manager.history.SimpleHistoryManager
component.description: define the completion history manager with default values

method.name: start
method.description: start the history manager

method.name: stop
method.description: stop the history manager

method.name: searchHistoryData
method.description: search and append the history data in the Component suggestion list

method.name: saveHistoryData
method.description: save the suggestion in history

method.name: resetHistory
method.description: reset the history data

property.name: enable
property.description: the state of the history storage

property.name: minQueryLength
property.description: the minimum query length

property.name: maxHistory
property.description: the maximum history size

property.name: stripAccents
property.description: Indicate if we use strip accents for the suggestions search in history

property.name: callbacks
property.description: the array containing all processable callbacks

component.name: wink.plugins.completion.manager.history.handler.LocalStorageHistoryHandler
component.description: define the local storage history handler

method.name: getHistoryData
method.description: return the history data for specified query

method.name: saveHistoryData
method.description: save the suggestion data in history

method.name: resetHistoryData
method.description: reset the history data

property.name: storageName
property.description: the history storage name

property.name: callbacks
property.description: the array containing all processable callbacks

component.name: wink.plugins.completion.manager.ManagerHelper
component.description: handle all specific manager's common process

method.name: createModules
method.description: create default and additional modules for the manager

parameter.name: managerType
parameter.description: the type of manager : dom, data or event

method.name: startModules
method.description: start each module of the manager

parameter.name: managerModules
parameter.description: the list of module to start

method.name: addModule
method.description: append a module in the manager's module array

method.name: getDefaultModule
method.description: return the default module of the specified manager

method.name: getModuleType
method.description: return the module type of the module instance

method.name: isModuleType
method.description: check if the suggestion is with the type of the module

component.name: wink.plugins.completion.module.data.DefaultDataModule
component.description: define the default completion data module

method.name: start
method.description: start the module

method.name: processSuggestion
method.description: process the current suggestion using data

property.name: mapping
property.description: the mapping array between data key name and internal suggestion key name

component.name: wink.plugins.completion.module.data.DirectLinkDataModule
component.description: define the direct link completion data module

method.name: start
method.description: start the module

method.name: processSuggestion
method.description: process the current suggestion using data

property.name: mapping
property.description: the mapping array between data key name and internal suggestion key name

component.name: wink.plugins.completion.module.data.LabelDataModule
component.description: define the label completion data module

method.name: start
method.description: start the module

method.name: processSuggestion
method.description: process the current suggestion using data

property.name: mapping
property.description: the mapping array between data key name and internal suggestion key name

component.name: wink.plugins.completion.module.dom.DefaultDomModule
component.description: define the default completion DOM module

method.name: start
method.description: start the module

method.name: processSuggestion
method.description: display the current suggestion DOM node

property.name: boldSuggestion
property.description: indicate if we have to bold the suggestion value

property.name: clearAccents
property.description: indicate if we have to remove accents before comparison

property.name: clearSeparatorChars
property.description: indicate if we have to remove special chars before comparison

property.name: callbacks
property.description: the array containing all processable callbacks

component.name: wink.plugins.completion.module.dom.LabelDomModule
component.description: define the label completion DOM module

method.name: processSuggestion
method.description: display the current suggestion DOM node

component.name: wink.plugins.completion.module.event.DefaultEventModule
component.description: define the default completion Event module

method.name: onMouseDown
method.description: manage the onMouseDown event on a suggestion

method.name: onClick
method.description: manage the onClick event on a suggestion

method.name: onKeyDown
method.description: manage the onKeyDown event on a suggestion

method.name: onKeyUp
method.description: manage the onKeyUp event on a suggestion

component.name: wink.plugins.completion.module.event.DirectLinkEventModule
component.description: define the Direct Link completion Event module

method.name: onClick
method.description: manage the onClick event on a suggestion

component.name: wink.plugins.completion.module.event.LabelEventModule
component.description: define the Label completion Event module

method.name: onMouseDown
method.description: manage the onMouseDown event on a suggestion

method.name: onClick
method.description: manage the onClick event on a suggestion

component.name: wink.plugins.completion.tools
component.description: set of general function that is used by the completion

method.name: clone
method.description: clone a simple object

method.name: ucFirst
method.description: capitalize the first letter of the string

method.name: lcFirst
method.description: minimize the first letter of the string

method.name: cleanQuery
method.description: clean a query string by removing left spaces and replacing multiple space

method.name: removeDuplicate
method.description: manage the onKeyDown event on a suggestion

component.name: wink.plugins.completion.searchTools
component.description: set of general function that is used by the completion

method.name: stripAccents
method.description: remove all accent and replace them by normal letter

method.name: stripSeparatorChars
method.description: manage the onClick event on a suggestion

parameter.name: str
parameter.description: the string to strip separator char

method.name: clearSpace
method.description: trim left and right and remove multiple space on the string

method.name: getBoldInv
method.description: manage the onKeyDown event on a suggestion

parameter.name: clearAccents
parameter.description: if we have to clear accent

parameter.name: clearSeparatorChars
parameter.description: if we have to clear separator chars

class.name: highlighted
class.description: Associated to w_completion_suggestion class, the highlighted completion suggestion

class.name: label
class.description: Associated to w_completion_suggestion class, the label completion suggestion
